bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Climatic Condition of hot weather. SW 70: 高者氣寒，下者氣熱 , “In the high lying [regions], the qi is cold; in the low-lying [regions], the qi is hot ”.

② Pharmacological Quality of pharmaceutical substances of a hot nature: Yi xue qi yuan 醫學啟源 7: 肉桂，氣熱，味 大辛 , “ Rou gui , its qi is hot , its flavor is strongly acrid”. ③ Pathological Condition of illnesses associated with hot bodily qi. Su wen 素問 28: 重實者，言大熱病， 氣熱脈滿 , “As for the so-called ‘doubled repletion,’ that is to say: a massive heat disease. [That is,] the qi is hot and the vessels are filled”.
